channel.title: Future server Convictscape Lots of people needed
channel.description:
[center][u][b][size=13pt]Convictscape[/size][/b][/u][/center]
[i][u][b]Forums[/b][/u][/i]: http://convictscape.smfforfree2.com/index.php
[u][i][b]Server staff[/b][/i][/u]: [u][i]Owners[/i][/u]:[u]masterp00n[/u],[u]pker b0y[/u]
[u][i]Admins[/i][/u]:Thug life(fr33sc4p3)
[i][u]Pmods[/u][/i]:None at the moment
[center][u][i][b][size=13pt]Forum developers/ Graphic/banner helpers[/size][/b][/i][/u][/center] Will be needed for editing forums, Ideas with forums and banners [u]~Luvin P I E~ ~Legendzpker~ ~open~ ~open~[/u]
[center][u][i][b][size=13pt]Coders[/size][/b][/i][/u][/center] Will be needed for improving Convictscape [u]~liamsford~ ~gonzie~ ~Luvin P I E~ ~Fr33sc4p3(Thug life)~ ~cabby~ [/u]
[center][u][i][b][size=13pt]Tester[/size][/b][/i][/u][/center] [u]~open~ ~open~ ~open~ ~open~ ~open~ ~open~[/u]
[center][size=10pt][size=13pt][u][i][b]Supporters[/b][/i][/u][/size][/size][/center] [u]~open~ ~open~ ~open~ ~open~[/u]
[center][u][i][b][size=13pt]Owners[/size][/b][/i][/u][/center] [u]~masterp00n(me) ~pker b0y~[/u]
[center][i][u][b][size=13pt]Server Admins[/size][/b][/u][/i][/center] [u]~Thug life~ ~open~ ~open~[/u]
[center][u][i][b][size=13pt]Server Pmods[/size][/b][/i][/u][/center] [u]~open~ ~open~ ~open~ ~open~[/u]
[center][i][u][b][size=13pt]Hoster[/size][/b][/u][/i][/center] ~open~(need some1 who can host 24/7)
IF you want to be in any one of these spots please post here
The forums are http://convictscape.smfforfree2.com/index.php incase you don't know I am currently trying to find a 24/7 hoster Probably frugooscape but I dunno yet It will have a 30 min auto restarter and also trying to buy a domain .com This will only happen when I get enough people
Thanks, masterp00n
